item.name: Universal Object Reference
item.description: Foundations of the Prime Framework and Universal Object Reference.

item.name: Universal Coordinates
item.description: The mathematical foundations and applications of universal coordinates, an extension of the UOR framework to numerical domains.

item.name: Temporal Coherence
item.description: The study of how time and temporal evolution integrate within the Universal Object Reference framework, examining time as an operator on prime coordinate space.

item.name: Signal Processing
item.description: The application of Universal Object Reference principles to signal processing, enabling transformations, compression, and preservation of information across different representational domains.

item.name: Internet Substrate
item.description: The application of Universal Object Reference principles to formalize the internet as a coherent topological space capable of functioning as a comprehensive digital twin of reality.

item.name: Prime Foundations
item.description: The core mathematical principles upon which the Universal Object Reference framework is built, establishing how objects can be uniquely represented through their prime components.

item.name: Eight Core UOR Axioms
item.description: The eight core axioms that codify the essential properties ensuring that any Unique Factorization Domain supports a fully coherent, observer-aware, prime-coordinate representation.

item.name: Extensions & Applications
item.description: Extensions of the UOR framework beyond its core axioms, demonstrating its applicability across diverse domains including number theory, physics, philosophy, and computer science.

item.name: Meaning
item.description: Exploration of meaning through the lens of the UOR Framework, examining how meaning emerges from structural relationships within prime decomposition representations.

item.name: Learning and Implementation
item.description: Structured approaches to learning and implementing the UOR Framework across different domains and applications.

item.name: Advanced Extensions
item.description: Advanced theoretical extensions of the UOR Framework addressing spatiotemporal integration, quantum systems, computational implementation challenges, and cross-framework connections.

item.name: Music
item.description: Exploration of music theory through the UOR Framework, revealing deep connections between harmonic structures, prime decompositions, and observer-invariant properties in musical experience.
